summary: AI Innovator specializing in LLM agents, system architecture, and human-centered AI. Building AI systems that feel alive.

ranked.text: Leading development of advanced LLM agent architectures. Building systems that combine reasoning, memory, and human interaction.
Designing scalable, robust system architectures for AI applications. Focus on distributed systems and microservices.
Background in computational neuroscience and signal processing. Applying insights from brain research to AI systems.
Teaching AI and machine learning. Developing educational content and workshops.
Various early-stage projects and research initiatives.

raw_lines: Building AI systems that feel alive
